name: The Basics
footer:
Resources used for this survey:
 * All of Us
 * US2020 Census
 * NHANES
 * GenIUSS group (Gender Identity in U.S. Surveillance)
 * National Health Interview Survey (NHIS)
 * Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS)
 * NHCHC
 * OurHealth

title.en: The Basics
title.es: Los Basicos
title.dev: DEV_The Basics

html.en:
About You

Please answer each question as honestly as possible. There are no right or wrong answers to any of the questions. We are looking for your own answers, and not what you think your doctors, family, or friends want you to say. If you do not want to answer, please select “Prefer not to answer” and move to the next question.
html.es:
Sobre ti

Por favor, responde cada pregunta lo más honestamente posible. No hay respuestas correctas o incorrectas a ninguna de las preguntas. Buscamos tus propias respuestas, y no lo que crees que tus médicos, familiares o amigos quieren que digas. Si no quieres responder, selecciona “Prefiero no responder” y pasa a la siguiente pregunta.
html.dev:
DEV_About You

DEV_Please answer each question as honestly as possible. There are no right or wrong answers to any of the questions. We are looking for your own answers, and not what you think your doctors, family, or friends want you to say. If you do not want to answer, please select “Prefer not to answer” and move to the next question.

title.en: We are interested in learning more about the South Asian Diaspora. Which of the following best applies to you?
title.es: Estamos interesados en aprender más sobre la diáspora del sur de Asia. ¿Cuál de las siguientes opciones se aplica mejor a ti?

text.en: My great-grandparents or an older generation were the first to leave South Asia.
text.es: Mis bisabuelos o una generación más antigua fueron los primeros en dejar el sur de Asia.
text.dev: DEV_My great-grandparents or an older generation were the first to leave South Asia.

text.en: My grandparents were the first to leave South Asia.
text.es: Mis abuelos fueron los primeros en dejar el sur de Asia.
text.dev: DEV_My grandparents were the first to leave South Asia.

text.en: My parents were the first to leave South Asia.
text.es: Mis padres fueron los primeros en dejar el sur de Asia.
text.dev: DEV_My parents were the first to leave South Asia.

text.en: I was the first to leave South Asia.
text.es: Yo fui el primero en dejar el sur de Asia.
text.dev: DEV_I was the first to leave South Asia.

text.es: Cuidando el hogar o la familia

text.es: Estudiante a tiempo completo o parcial

title.en:
One of the things we're trying to understand is how people's income may affect their use of health services.

What is your annual household income from all sources? Household income includes your income plus the income of all family members in your household for the last calendar year. Include all wages and other sources of income.
title.es:
Una de las cosas que estamos tratando de entender es cómo el ingreso de las personas puede afectar su uso de los servicios de salud.

¿Cuál es tu ingreso anual del hogar de todas las fuentes? El ingreso del hogar incluye tu ingreso más el ingreso de todos los miembros de la familia en tu hogar durante el último año calendario. Incluye todos los salarios y otras fuentes de ingresos.
title.dev:
DEV_One of the things we're trying to understand is how people's income may affect their use of health services.

What is your annual household income from all sources? Household income includes your income plus the income of all family members in your household for the last calendar year. Include all wages and other sources of income.

title.en: Do you own or rent the place where you live?
title.es: ¿Eres dueño o inquilino del lugar donde vives?
title.dev: DEV_Do you own or rent the place where you live?

text.en: Live with family (I am not the homeowner and do not pay rent)
text.es: Vivo con la familia (No soy el dueño de la casa y no pago alquiler)
text.dev: DEV_Live with family (I am not the homeowner and do not pay rent)

title.es: ¿Dónde vives actualmente?

text.es: Refugio de emergencia/refugio para personas sin hogar
